Docs.summary: Reads a tar archive from a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public TarReader (System.IO.Stream archiveStream, bool leaveOpen = false);

Public Sub New (archiveStream As Stream, Optional leaveOpen As Boolean = false)

Docs.param: to dispose the when this instance is disposed; to leave the stream open.
Docs.summary: Initializes a instance that can read tar entries from the specified stream, and can optionally leave the stream open upon disposal of this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Disposes the current instance, and disposes the streams of all the entries that were read from the archive.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The <xref:System.Formats.Tar.TarEntry.DataStream> property of any entry can be replaced with a new stream. If the user decides to replace it on a <xref:System.Formats.Tar.TarEntry> instance that was obtained using a <xref:System.Formats.Tar.TarReader>, the underlying stream gets disposed immediately, freeing the <xref:System.Formats.Tar.TarReader> of origin from the responsibility of having to dispose it.

Docs.summary: The format of the archive. It is initially . The archive format is detected after the first call to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Formats.Tar.TarEntry GetNextEntry(bool copyData) cil managed
Public Function GetNextEntry (Optional copyData As Boolean = false) As TarEntry

param.name: copyData
param.para: to copy the data of the entry into a new . This is helpful when the underlying archive stream is unseekable, and the data needs to be accessed later.
if the data should not be copied into a new stream. If the underlying stream is unseekable, the user has the responsibility of reading and processing the immediately after calling this method.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the next entry from the archive stream.
Docs.returns: A instance if a valid entry was found, or if the end of the archive has been reached.
Docs.exception:
The archive is malformed.
-or-
The archive contains entries in different formats.
-or-
More than one Global Extended Attributes Entry was found in the current archive.
-or-
Two or more Extended Attributes entries were found consecutively in the current archive.

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ GlobalExtendedAttributes { System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a read-only dictionary containing the string key-value pairs of the Global Extended Attributes in the first entry of the archive, if the archive format is .

remarks.para: If there is no Global Extended Attributes entry at the beginning of the archive, this property returns an empty read-only dictionary.
If the first entry has not been read by calling , this property returns .
